# CA360º Portal Release Evidence Pack Template

**Release Version:** vX.Y.Z  
**Release Date:** YYYY-MM-DD  
**Release Type:** RC | RELEASED  
**Generated By:** CI Workflow

## Purpose

This evidence pack provides defensible proof that the CA360º portal meets all release criteria. It is generated automatically at each RC cut and must accompany all RELEASED versions.
